title: Top Economists to Larson: 'It Is Essential We Act Now' on Debt Ceiling, Warnings Come as Moody's Announces Review of US Credit Rating | Congressman John Larson

outline.text: Rep. Larson: “Given what’s happening around the globe…what is your advice to the Congress
Simon Johnson, Professor of Entrepreneurship at MIT Sloan School of Management (and
former chief economist at the IMF): “You cannot play games with something this serious.
